job.title: REMOTE Data Scientist
job.description:
Come work as a Remote Data Scientist at one of the Top Company that offers exceptional benefits with opportunities to advance and learn alongside accomplished Technology leaders.                    Important Note: This is 100% REMOTE position.        Must Have Skills:        - 4+ years of hands-on experience in developing analytics with machine learning, deep learning, NLP, and/or other related modelling techniques   
  - 3 - 5 years of experience using advanced data science tools such as R, Python, SQL, Spark and H2O   
  - 3 - 5 years of experience developing and deploying analytic solutions using AWS or Azure or GCP   
  - Experience working with extremely large data sets   
          Responsibilities:        - Research, Design, Implement and Deploy full-stack scalable machine learning solutions to support intelligent operations initiatives   
  - Conduct hands-on data analysis and predictive analytics on large datasets   
  - Apply computational algorithms and statistical methods to structured and unstructured data   
  - Effectively communicate complex technical results to business partners   
  - Support and drive analytic efforts around machine learning and innovation   
  - Work with a great deal of autonomy to find solutions to complex problems   
  - Coach and mentor junior data scientists   
    Benefits:        - Top industry pay   
  - Excellent growth and advancement opportunities   
                                               Data Scientist
